entry.title: New release for Kubero: v2.4.0
entry.content:
Requires Kubero Operator version v0.1.2

What's Changed

ğŸŒŸ Feature / Use new build CRD to create images with Buildpacks, Nixpacks and Dockerfiles by @mms-gianni in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/368 ğŸŒŸ Feature / Add scale to zero (sleep on inactivity) by @mms-gianni in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/386 ğŸŒŸ Feature / Implement multiple domains per app by @mms-gianni in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/385 ğŸŒŸ Feature / Rename buildpacks to runpacks visually by @mms-gianni in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/367 ğŸŒŸ Feature / Adding option to select ingress class by @cskiwi in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/301 ğŸŒŸ Feature / Improve feature detection for UI by @mms-gianni in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/387 ğŸŒŸ Feature / Show build logs by @mms-gianni in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/383 ğŸ”§ Maintenance / Update form.vue - correct loadRepository invocation by @vhqtvn in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/355 ğŸ”§ Maintenance / Bump tar from 6.2.0 to 6.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/356 ğŸ”§ Maintenance / Update node packages by @mms-gianni in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/360 ğŸ”§ Maintenance / Bump axios from 0.27.2 to 0.28.0 in /server by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/357 ğŸ”§ Maintenance / Bump follow-redirects from 1.15.3 to 1.15.6 in /server by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/359 ğŸ”§ Maintenance / Bump semver and nodemon in /server by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/362 ğŸ”§ Maintenance / Bump tar from 6.2.0 to 6.2.1 in /server by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/365 ğŸ”§ Maintenance / Bump braces from 3.0.2 to 3.0.3 in /server by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/366 ğŸ”§ Maintenance / Bump ws from 6.2.2 to 6.2.3 in /server by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/369 ğŸ”§ Maintenance / Bump ws, engine.io and socket.io-adapter in /server by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/384 ğŸ”§ Maintenance / Bump express from 4.18.2 to 4.19.2 in /server by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/358 ğŸ¨ Template / Add kener template by @mms-gianni in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/388 ğŸ¨ Template / Add metube downloader by @mms-gianni in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/380 ğŸª³ Fix / Loading addons and volumes by @mms-gianni in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/382 ğŸª³ Fix / Restart issues by @mms-gianni in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/390 ğŸª³ Fix / Avoid crashing when notifications not configured (backward compatibility) by @mms-gianni in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/378

entry.title: New release for Kubero: v2.4.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump micromatch from 4.0.7 to 4.0.8 in /client by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/393
  • Bump axios from 1.7.2 to 1.7.4 in /client by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/394
  • fix: catch startup error when prometheus is not accessible/configureswq by @mms-gianni in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/396
  • Release/v2.4.1 by @mms-gianni in https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/pull/397

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kubero-dev/kubero/compare/v2.4.0...v2.4.1
